content.title: Unveiling Saudi Arabia with Anjad
content.intro: At Anjad, our passion for Saudi Arabia drives us to create immersive travel experiences that highlight its rich history, diverse culture, and breathtaking landscapes.
content.description: From ancient wonders to hidden gems, we craft seamless, unforgettable journeys designed for true explorers.
content.call_to_action: Discover the Kingdom like never before.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide a diverse range of services catering to domestic travelers and adventurers. From tailor-made experiences to all-inclusive packages, we offer the necessary support to deliver a highly competitive final product. Explore further to discover the extensive array of services we offer:
services.about: Based in Riyadh, Anjad specializes in crafting seamless, detail-oriented travel experiences across Saudi Arabia. With a team of expert guides and a deep passion for storytelling, we bring history, culture, and landscapes to life. From vibrant cities to hidden gems, we ensure every journey is immersive, authentic, and unforgettable.

multiTrip.title: A 9-Day Immersive Journey Through History, Culture, and Adventure
multiTrip.subtitle: Experience the Magic of Saudi Arabia
multiTrip.description: Embark on an unforgettable 9-day adventure across Saudi Arabia with Anjad, where history, culture, and breathtaking landscapes come to life. From the bustling heart of Riyadh to the ancient wonders of AlUla, the serene beauty of Wadi Disah, and the vibrant coastal charm of Jeddah, this journey offers a perfect blend of heritage and exploration.
multiTrip.description2: From thrilling desert escapades to cultural deep dives, Anjad ensures a seamless and enriching experience. Whether you're a history enthusiast, nature lover, or adventure seeker, this journey promises memories that will last a lifetime.

quotes.text: An incredible journey through Saudi Arabia's rich history and culture. The guides were knowledgeable and the experiences were unforgettable.
quotes.author: Sarah M. - UK

quotes.text: From ancient ruins to modern cities, this tour perfectly balanced history, adventure, and comfort. Highly recommended!
quotes.author: John D. - USA

whyKSA.title: Why Visit Saudi Arabia?
whyKSA.subtitle: A Land of Culture, History, and Innovation
highlights: The Red Sea - Crystal Clear Waters

intro.title: Why KSA?
intro.description: Saudi Arabia is a land of contrasts, where ancient history meets modern innovation. As the largest country in the Middle East, the Kingdom offers a rich blend of cultural heritage, stunning landscapes, and economic opportunities. Here's why Saudi Arabia should be your next destination:

richHistory.title: A Land of Rich History
richHistory.description: Saudi Arabia is home to some of the world's most significant historical sites:
items: AlUla – An open-air museum with Nabatean tombs older than Petra
Diriyah – The birthplace of the Saudi state and a UNESCO-listed heritage site
Jeddah's Al-Balad – A vibrant historical district with centuries-old architecture

culturalExperiences.title: Unique Cultural Experiences
culturalExperiences.description: Immerse yourself in authentic Arabian culture:
items: Traditional Markets (Souqs): Discover spices, handmade crafts, and Bedouin treasures
Hospitality: Experience the legendary warm welcome and generosity of Saudi people
Festivals & Events: From Riyadh Season to Janadriyah Festival, celebrate Saudi culture

naturalWonders.title: Breathtaking Natural Wonders
naturalWonders.description: The Kingdom boasts diverse landscapes, from deserts to coastlines:
items: The Red Sea – World-class diving and untouched islands
The Empty Quarter – The largest sand desert in the world, perfect for adventure seekers
Asir Mountains – Cool weather and lush green terraces in the south

businessHub.title: A Thriving Economy & Business Hub
businessHub.description: Saudi Arabia is the heart of the Middle East's economy:
items: Vision 2030: A transformative initiative making KSA a global tourism and business powerhouse
NEOM & The Line: Futuristic smart cities redefining urban living
Growing Investment Opportunities: A pro-business environment attracting global investors

pilgrimage.title: Pilgrimage & Spiritual Significance
pilgrimage.description: Saudi Arabia is the birthplace of Islam and home to the two holiest cities:
items: Makkah: The site of the Hajj pilgrimage, one of Islam's five pillars
Madinah: The final resting place of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

modernInfrastructure.title: Easy Access & Modern Infrastructure
modernInfrastructure.description: Saudi Arabia is more connected than ever:
items: E-Visas & Visa on Arrival – Traveling to KSA is now simpler for many nationalities
New Mega Projects: High-speed rail, new airports, and luxury resorts are transforming travel

summary.title: Why Choose Saudi Arabia?
summary.description: Because it's an experience like no other. Whether you're looking for adventure, cultural immersion, or business opportunities, Saudi Arabia is a land of endless possibilities.

contact.footer: Let Anjad be your gateway to discovering the Kingdom like never before.

fullDay.title: Full-Day City Tour - For groups (1-3 people)

pickup.question: Pickup Locations
pickup.answer: We offer pickup from all major hotels in Riyadh. Your exact pickup time will be confirmed 24 hours before the tour.

whatToBring.question: What to Bring
whatToBring.answer: Comfortable walking shoes, sunscreen, and modest clothing. Don't forget your camera!

cancellation.question: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour. Less than 24 hours notice will result in a 50% charge.

tour.headline: Experience the Best of Jeddah in One Day!
tour.subHeadline: A journey through history, culture, and coastal beauty

alBalad.title: Al-Balad (Old Jeddah)
alBalad.description: Explore the UNESCO-listed historic district with traditional Hijazi architecture.

fishMarket.title: Fish Market
fishMarket.description: Experience the vibrant seafood trade and see the freshest Red Sea catches.

corniche.title: Jeddah Waterfront (Corniche)
corniche.description: Enjoy a scenic stroll along the coast. The Corniche offers breathtaking views of the Red Sea and the city's iconic landmarks.

kingFahdFountain.title: King Fahd Fountain
kingFahdFountain.description: View the world's tallest seawater fountain. It symbolizes the city's legacy of water and is a symbol of Saudi Arabia's prosperity and progress.

floatingMosque.title: Floating Mosque
floatingMosque.description: Visit this serene site by the sea. The mosque is a stunning example of Islamic architecture and is a symbol of Saudi Arabia's culture and spirituality.

hayyJameel.title: Hayy Jameel
hayyJameel.description: Explore contemporary art and cultural exhibitions. Hayy Jameel is a vibrant hub for art and culture, showcasing the latest works from talented artists from around the world.

items.expertGuides: Knowledgeable guides who bring Jeddah's history to life
items.comfortableTransport: Modern, air-conditioned vehicles for a pleasant journey
items.authenticExperiences: Immerse yourself in genuine local culture and traditions
items.easyBooking: Simple, secure booking process with instant confirmation

tour.headline: Step Back in Time with the One-Day AlUla Tour
tour.subHeadline: Discover the awe-inspiring history and natural wonders of Saudi Arabia's hidden gem
tour.welcomeDescription: Step into Saudi Arabia's open-air museum, where ancient civilizations have left their mark on dramatic desert landscapes. AlUla, home to the Kingdom's first UNESCO World Heritage Site, invites you on a journey through time.

hegra.title: Hegra (Mada'in Salih)
hegra.description: Visit Saudi Arabia's first UNESCO World Heritage Site, featuring over 100 monumental Nabataean tombs carved into magnificent rock formations. These ancient wonders tell stories of a civilization that once controlled vital trade routes.

dadan.title: Dadan & Jabal Ikmah
dadan.description: Discover ancient rock inscriptions and relics of lost civilizations at this remarkable archaeological site. Explore the capital of the Dadan and Lihyan kingdoms, witnessing thousands of years of human history carved in stone.

oldTown.title: AlUla Old Town
oldTown.description: Walk through historical streets with beautifully restored mudbrick houses, experiencing 12 centuries of history. This preserved ancient city offers a glimpse into traditional Arabian architecture and daily life through the ages.

elephantRock.title: Elephant Rock
elephantRock.description: Admire this majestic natural rock formation at sunset, where nature has carved a perfect elephant-like shape from the desert stone. Experience breathtaking views and perfect photo opportunities in the golden hour light.

maraya.title: Maraya Concert Hall
maraya.description: Marvel at the world's largest mirrored building, a stunning architectural masterpiece that reflects the beauty of AlUla's desert landscape. This modern wonder hosts world-class performances in a uniquely dramatic setting.

afternoon.title: Afternoon - Cultural & Architectural Marvels
activities: Walk through AlUla Old Town’s mudbrick streets
Enjoy lunch at a traditional Arabian restaurant
Visit Maraya Concert Hall, the world's largest mirrored building
Explore nature trails and rock formations

evening.title: Evening - Sunset & Stargazing
activities: Experience the breathtaking view at Elephant Rock
Relax at a desert camp with Arabian hospitality
Enjoy traditional Saudi cuisine under the stars
Stargazing in the clear AlUla desert sky

items.expertGuides: Our guides are passionate storytellers with deep knowledge of AlUla's history and culture.
items.support: Dedicated customer service team available throughout your journey.
